raw_body:
PATTIARACHCHI – DON SARATHCHANDRA – (Retired Director – Planning – Ministry of Irrigation & Water Resources Management,​ later worked at Komuthi Engineering Service (Pvt) Ltd. as DGM). Beloved husband of Srima Shanthi,​ son of late Jinapala Pattiarachchi and late Gnanawathi (Dotty),​ loving father of Dr Nadeesha Pattiarachchi,​ father-in-law of Dr Pubudu Jayawardena (Australia),​ loving grandfather of Omiru Jayawardena,​ brother of Maya Gunasekera,​ Gamini Pattiarachchi (New Zealand) and Sriya Wickramasinghe,​ died under tragic circumstances. Funeral to be held on Wednesday,​ 6th of March. Remains lie at No. 3A,​ Sirimal Mawatha,​ Quarry Road,​ Dehiwala,​ from 9.00 a.m. Cortege leaves residence at 4.00 p.m. for burial at 5.00 p.m. at Kohuwala Cemetery.
016035
